text: Anthony Ferraro Louis Barber (born 28 March 1940) is an English-Australian television game show host, radio announcer and singer. He was born in Oldham, Lancashire. His career began in 1961. In 1973, he won a Logie Award. He is known for hosting Sale of the Century. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Naturalised citizens of Australia Category:English television personalities Category:English television presenters Category:English radio personalities Category:Australian television presenters Category:Australian radio personalities Category:Singers from Lancashire Category:Entertainers from Western Australia
title: Tony Barber
